product_name: Cotton Buds Tissue To Go Toilet Paper
long_description: The Cotton Buds Tissue To Go toilet paper comes in a handy dispenser that keeps the tissue neat, clean and dry while you trek and travel. Filled with a 75-sheet roll of soft 2-ply toilet tissue. Dispenser pack keeps toilet tissue dry and clean while allowing only what you need to be dispensed. Cotton Buds Tissue To Go toilet paper conveniently fits in a purse, pocket, backpack or glove compartment.
short_description: The Cotton Buds Tissue To Go toilet paper comes in a handy dispenser that keeps the tissue neat, clean and dry while you trek and travel.
